channel.title: ~[HOST]~ -Will run your private server 24/7- [READ FOR MORE INFO]
channel.description:
Hello my name is Flame, i've been working with private servers for quite awhile and i am very experinced, I can host\code it so it has the servers name everything etc blah blah....
System - - - -- - - - - - - - - - 4GB ram, 1000gb (yeah i bought gb sticks :P ) i can host it 24/7 and i am running windows vista.----------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- What i want in return, either a runescape account or official co-owner\coder on your server even though I would have acess to the files xD I am actively on everyday and can handle much :)... You can contact me skype\yahoo, and preferably MSN - MT12094@hotmail.com.. However, what i would not want would be an @$$-hole owner.
---What i'm looking for in the owner--- 1. Must be dedicated with the server dont quit the first week just because either people dont play OR your getting tired of the server.. 2. Must be actively on daily, so i can contact you if something goes wrong.. ---------------------------------------------- [b]Note:[/b] [i]Those are my TWO MAIN things im looking for. theres other small things but not as important.[/i] Contact me MSN - Mt12094@hotmail.com

item.title: ~[HOST]~ -Will run your private server 24/7- [READ FOR MORE INFO]
item.dc:creator: @bakkak bakkak
item.description:
@bakkak wrote:

[size=14pt]I[/size] will give you [sup]Co[/sup] Owner status, and [font=impact]share[/font] the profits that are to come from the server, with you.

  • I WILL also give you an insight, while I’m coding - of what I’m doing, and possibly ask for your opinion.

  • I WILL practice coding, everyday to top recent updates I’ve made (When I start coding server); and I’ll ofcourse donate to server myself.

  • I WILL NOT let you down, nor will I quit server. It has always been my true dream to lead a RSPS, and make my own staff and control the players, make my own rules and such.

  • I hope you give me a try, or atleast reply back - even if you don’t want to do it with me.

Regards, Tobias

  • Further ways to contact me, if I don’t reply on forums; MSN. “TobiasMuzz@Hotail.Com” , Skype “DkzHorsdal” , Steam “WtfKitty”.

Read full topic
